mapper.insert: insert into tb_file (id, file_name, format, size, location, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id}, #{fileName}, #{format}, #{size}, #{location}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update tb_file set
file_name = #{fileName},
format = #{format},
update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.delete:
update tb_file set is_deleted = 1 where
id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, file_name, format, size, location from tb_file where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
